title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.8 - Submission of documentation to the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.8 - Submission of documentation to the department

State Regulations

Physicians, PAs and SAs must submit documentation of course completion to DOH, except that such persons holding privileges or affiliated with or employed by DOH regulated health care facilities, including home health care agencies, need not submit documentation of course completion to the department. DOH regulated health care facilities, including home health care agencies, shall maintain documentation in credentialing or employment files of such infection control training and education of physicians, PAs and SAs. Notes

92-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
